targets.query: clusterName.keyword:$cluster AND buildId.keyword:$buildId AND namespace.keyword:$namespace AND pod.keyword:$pod AND container_name.keyword:$container AND microservice.keyword:$microservice

kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes: >=$min_memory_request AND clusterName.keyword:$cluster AND buildId.keyword:$buildId AND namespace.keyword:$namespace AND pod.keyword:$pod AND container_name.keyword:$container AND microservice.keyword:$microservice

panels.title: Memory WorkingSet (this is what the OOM killer is watching for)

targets.query: kube_pod_container_resource_requests_memory_bytes: >=$min_memory_request AND clusterName.keyword:$cluster AND buildId.keyword:$buildId AND namespace.keyword:$namespace AND pod.keyword:$pod AND container_name.keyword:$container AND microservice.keyword:$microservice

panels.title: Memory Usage (this metric also includes cached items that can be evicted under memory pressure)

targets.query: kube_pod_container_resource_requests_cpu_cores: >=$min_cpu_request AND clusterName.keyword:$cluster AND buildId.keyword:$buildId AND namespace.keyword:$namespace AND pod.keyword:$pod AND container_name.keyword:$container AND microservice.keyword:$microservice

list.definition: {"find": "terms", "field": "microservice.keyword","query": "clusterName: $cluster AND buildId: $buildId AND namespace: $namespace AND node.keyword:$node" }
list.label: uService
list.name: microservice
list.query: {"find": "terms", "field": "microservice.keyword","query": "clusterName: $cluster AND buildId: $buildId AND namespace: $namespace AND node.keyword:$node" }

list.definition: {"find": "terms", "field": "pod.keyword","query": "clusterName.keyword: $cluster AND buildId.keyword: $buildId AND namespace.keyword:$namespace AND microservice.keyword:$microservice AND node.keyword:$node" }
list.label: POD
list.name: pod
list.query: {"find": "terms", "field": "pod.keyword","query": "clusterName.keyword: $cluster AND buildId.keyword: $buildId AND namespace.keyword:$namespace AND microservice.keyword:$microservice AND node.keyword:$node" }

list.definition: {"find": "terms", "field": "container_name.keyword","query": "clusterName.keyword: $cluster AND buildId.keyword: $buildId AND namespace.keyword:$namespace AND pod.keyword:$pod  AND microservice.keyword:$microservice AND node.keyword:$node" }
list.label: Container
list.name: container
list.query: {"find": "terms", "field": "container_name.keyword","query": "clusterName.keyword: $cluster AND buildId.keyword: $buildId AND namespace.keyword:$namespace AND pod.keyword:$pod  AND microservice.keyword:$microservice AND node.keyword:$node" }
